SD_height <- function(n, h_mn, h_sd) {
  x <- 
    rnorm(1000000, mean = h_mn, sd = h_sd) %>% 
    subset(., . >=0)
  x[1:n] %>% 
    round(digits = 2) %>% 
    as.data.frame()
}
